Key Match Events: Shreyas Iyer hit 6 fours and 4 sixes in his unbeaten 74
Sanju Samson took 23 off the 13th over
Ravindra Jadeja did the bulk of the scoring from there on
Post-Match Reflections: India's win was their 11th on the trot in T20Is
The win gave the hosts an unassailable 2-0 lead in the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dushmantha Chameera dismissed Rohit Sharma for the fifth time in T20Is
Others: India lost Rohit Sharma in the first over of the chase
India were 56 for 2 after eight overs, needing another 128 from the last 12
